extension.description: This repository contains kodi addons created by jmooremcc.

[COLOR khaki]Fentastic[/COLOR][COLOR snow]Wizard[/COLOR] offers many maintenance features, selective add-on data saving, and automated build installs. Perfect for keeping your Kodi running and creating your own builds. You can also customize this add-on to make it your own.[CR]Many thanks to the developers drinfernoo and slamious for bringing us the Leia and Matrix versions of this add-on.
extension.news: 2.0.9 - Updated to include future Kodi Omega Builds 2.0.8 - Updated to include Kodi Nexus Builds 2.0.7 - Fix Error when using default log settings 2.0.6 - Fix regex for formatting tags - Fix theme selection after build install - Fix downloading into invalid path 2.0.5 - Add Enable All Add-ons after Build Install 2.0.4 - Fix leftover broken dialogs 2.0.3 - Don't show previous version builds in Matrix 2.0.2 - Replace remaining occurences of LOGNOTICE 2.0.1 - Add attribution to @slamious 2.0.0 - Initial Matrix support 1.4.5 - Fix bugs with unintended files being cleared` 1.4.4 - Transfer ownership 1.4.3 - Fix missing artwork on items (thanks @xulek) 1.4.2 - A few bug fixes 1.4.1 - Fix crash on fresh installs 1.4.0 - Fix APK Installer - Convert official APK downloader to use official script - Add scrollbar to Save Data dialog - Fix skin path in build info 1.3.7 - Fix import lock error 1.3.6 - Fix notifications - Cleanup log files 1.3.5 - Add Fen - Add Shadow - Fix restoring saved data every boot 1.3.4 - Fix bad indent 1.3.3 - Fix Unicode characters in notification window 1.3.2 - Fix build restore 1.3.1 - Fix "Keep Login Info" menu 1.3.0 - Fix formatting of saved restore times - Fix local build zip being deleted on restore - Add YouTube API saving - Remove broken context menus - Fix repeating dialogs from shortcuts/favorites - Remove "Normal Install" option - Add "Logging Tools" menu - Add option to save guisettings.xml - Add TMDbHelper Fanart.tv saving - More fixes for OS X - Fix Seren Fanart.tv saving 1.2.9 - Fix NuMb3r5 cache clearing - Fix hang during repo force check - Fix logins being restored every startup - Fix some file permission errors - Fix OS X backup errors 1.2.8 - Add Gaia PM OAuth - Fix binary add-on restoration - Fix some issues with old settings - Fix timing on many startup tasks 1.2.7 - Add TheMovieDb Helper 1.2.6 - Fix Seren PM OAuth 1.2.5 - Fix typo in debridit.py 1.2.4 - Cover more edge cases during binary detection 1.2.3 - Fix notification ID bug 1.2.2 - Add Seren PM OAuth - Add AllDebrid spport for Gaia, Seren, ResolveURL, and URLResolver 1.2.1 - General bug fixes 1.2.0 - Silence save data notifications on startup - Fix Addon Installer menu - Convert addons.txt to JSON format 1.1.1 - Fix error on advancedsettings categories 1.1.0 - Add back advancedsettings area under System Tweaks/Fixes - Rudimentary version of advancedsettings editor. Can currently only handle editing pre-existing tags under 'cache' and 'network'. - Convert advanced.txt to JSON format - Add "built-in" advancedsettings.xml presets 1.0.3 - Update artwork - Fix rare issues with URLs not working - Fix repetitive build prompt (again) - Fix builds downloading twice - Fix title coloring on notifications - Fix auto repo install - Fix first run settings not being respected 1.0.2 - Fix crash in login menu - Fix auto install repo 1.0.1 - Fix double startup - Fix repetitive build prompt - Fix main menu not opening on Krypton - Fix notification timeout - Fix crash in Trakt menu 1.0.0 - Initial Commit

extension.description: Merriam-Webster definition of GRATIS: without charge or recompense : FREE!!!

extension.summary: Addon repository of the Kodinerds Community
extension.description: The 'Nerdsrepo' is the Repository of the german Kodi Community 'Kodinerds' (www.kodinerds.net). Most of the hosted Addons here are active developed and supported by the members of the Community. Nerdsrepo is an unofficial Repository of the Kodi Media Center Software

Das 'Nerdsrepo' ist das Addon Repository der deutschen Kodi-Community 'Kodinerds' (www.kodinerds.net). Die meisten der hier im Nerdsrepo gehosteten Addons werden von den Mitgliedern der Community aktiv entwickelt und unterstützt. Das Nerdsrepo ist ein unoffizielles Repository der Kodi Media Center Software.

extension.summary: eXtended MOD of Confluence skin originally by Jezz_X and CCM by Mudislander.
eXtended MOD of Confluence skin originally by Jezz_X and CCM by Mudislander.
Uitgebreide MOD van Confluence skin origineel door Jezz_X en CCM door Mudislander.
extension.description: Xonfluence is a MOD of Confluence to enable a greater degree of user customisation to the default skin (based by Mudislander's CCM).
Xonfluence is a MOD of Confluence to enable a greater degree of user customisation to the default skin (based by Mudislander's CCM).
Xonfluence is een MOD van Confluence om een grotere aanpassingsmogelijkheid te geven ten opzichten van de standaard skin (gebaseerd op Mudislander's CCM).
extension.disclaimer: You break it - You get to keep the pieces
You break it - You get to keep the pieces
Wie zijn billen brandt - moet op de blaren zitten
